properties.body:
1. THE POINTS OF CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESSES LISTED
   UNDER THE "CONTACT INFO" LINK ON THE NGA
   MARITIME SAFETY INFORMATION (MSI) WEBSITE WERE
   UNUSABLE STARTING 01 MAR. THIS INCLUDED ALL
   MARITIME CUSTOMER DATABASE (MCD) GROUP EMAILS
   FOR THE NGA MARITIME SAFETY OFFICE.
2. THE ISSUE HAS SINCE BEEN RESOLVED. CUSTOMERS WHO
   SUBMITTED AN EMAIL QUERY VIA ANY OF THOSE EMAIL
   ADDRESSES AND DID NOT RECEIVE AN ACKNOWLEDGEMENT
   SHOULD RESUBMIT SO IT CAN BE ADDRESSED.
3. FOR URGENT SERVICE, CONTACT NGA NAVSAFETY,
   DSN: 547 5455,
   COMM: 800 362 6289 OR 571 557 5455,
   E-MAIL: NAVSAFETY@NGA.MIL OR
   MSG TO NGA NAVSAFETY WASHINGTON DC.
4. CANCEL THIS MSG 14 JUN 19.
